title: Meadowlarkers 49: "Home Run King Legitimacy"
description:
Joe Posnanski joins Howard Bryant and Kate Fagan for a special baseball edition of the Meadowlarkers. The team break down why the baseball media was so desperate to cover Aaron Judge's race to break the AL home run record and what a record even means in the bigger context of the sport anymore.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Joe Posnanski joins Howard Bryant and Kate Fagan for a special baseball edition of the Meadowlarkers. The team break down why the baseball media was so desperate to cover Aaron Judge's race to break the AL home run record and what a record even means in the bigger context of the sport anymore.
